name: Blaze It
description:
A dungeon, four objects, and a riddle scrawled on the wall. What could it all mean?

A submission for the Extra Credits Game Design Jam 2018.

Credits
Amanda Baker - Programming, Level Building
Louis Infuhr - Texturing, UI
Nico Thaxton - Level & Puzzle Design, Voice Acting
Nate Holle (Nayte the Hermit) - Music, Sound Design
Henry Klotz - Production, 3D Design

Some assets acquired from TurboSquid.
